EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2019.S1P Apache Geode - 3/26/19
EmailTemplate.subject: Submit your Geode Summit 2019 session proposals, register to attend
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-email-q119]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
It’s back! The fourth Geode Summit is coming your way this October. As with prior years, this year’s Geode Summit will be held in conjunction with SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-email-q119]]>, which takes place in Austin, TX from Oct 7–10, 2019. Call for proposals is now open Want to share your story? Submit your talk <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/cfp?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-email-q119]]> by April 12, 2019 at 11:59pm (PDT)—just indicate Geode as the topic when you make your submission. This is a great opportunity to share your Geode knowledge, success stories, and best practices. Need a little inspiration? Check out the videos from past Geode Summits (2018 <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL62pIycqXx-ShuJ1YpV2wlmNZodnqzY8T]]>, 2017 <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL62pIycqXx-QfmNrUmfKoTZXKU5K90JpK]]>, and 2016 <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL62pIycqXx-RCEP2APj4Mq9Oeyvskj_0K]]>). Register now and save Join us for a half day of Geode-only sessions on the first day of the conference (Mon, Oct 7, 1–6pm), followed by a number of Geode sessions Tue–Thu. There are two ways to register: 1) A full conference registration entitles you to attend any of the Geode sessions, including the half-day Geode block on Monday, Oct 7. (The full conference pass prices do go up over time, so it's important to register early.) In addition to the early bird discount, you can use discount code S1P200_JMirani for an extra $200 off your pass. That’s a savings of $800 off the full conference pass if you register by April 24, 2019 at 11:59pm (PDT). 2) For those who only want to attend the Monday Geode sessions, select the reduced-price Monday-only option. Register now and save. <[[https://springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-email-q119]]> I hope to see you in Austin this fall! Regards, Jag
